tools.name: send_message
tools.description: Send a message to a Telegram chat.

chat_id.description: Target chat ID. Falls back to TELEGRAM_CHAT_ID env var if not provided.

offset.description: Identifier of the first update to be returned. Use to acknowledge previously received updates.

limit.description: Maximum number of updates to retrieve (default: 100, max: 100)

tools.name: reply_to_message
tools.description: Reply to a specific message in a Telegram chat.

chat_id.description: The chat ID containing the message to reply to

message_id.description: The ID of the message to reply to

tools.name: get_me
tools.description: Get information about the bot (username, id, name).
